content:
Diagnosis:		Endometrial cancer

Management:		15 Jan 2024 Total laparoscopic hysterectomy and bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy

Histology:		Grade 2 endometrioid adenocarcinoma, FIGO Stage 1A
			MMR deficient, MSI-high

Current Situation:	Post-operative follow-up

[redacted name] attended clinic today for first post-operative review. She has recovered well from surgery with no complications. Her wounds have healed satisfactorily and she reports good energy levels. She has returned to most normal activities. No concerning symptoms reported. Vaginal vault well-healed on examination. Given the MMR-deficient status, I have arranged genetics referral as discussed at MDT. Her case was discussed at Gynae MDT on 12 Feb 2024 - recommendation is for surveillance only given Stage 1A disease. Plan for 3-monthly follow-up in first year. Next appointment arranged for May 2024. CT chest/abdomen/pelvis and tumor markers arranged for one week before next clinic visit.

cancer_timeline.value: Total laparoscopic hysterectomy and bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy
Case discussed at Gynae MDT - recommendation for surveillance only given Stage 1A disease

patient_facts.value: Good energy levels, returned to most normal activities

status_updates.value: Stage 1A endometrial cancer post-surgical treatment. Good recovery from surgery with no complications.
Recovered well from surgery with no complications
CT chest/abdomen/pelvis and tumor markers arranged before next clinic
Genetics referral arranged due to MMR-deficient status. Follow-up in clinic in May 2024
